content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help you schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC appointment. May I have your name, please?
Hey there. Listen, I'm just way too busy this month to set anything up. Can you check back next month maybe?
No problem at all! If your schedule opens up or your needs change, feel free to reach out. We’re here whenever you’re ready. Have a great day!
reason: Customer is too busy to schedule this month.
